short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jump to a random Chrome/Edge tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you like me, who has a million open YouTube tabs for "watch later"? Yeaaah...
If you have troubles deciding which tab to open next - this extension is for you. It will open select a random tab from those that you already have opened. And yes, it can optionally close current tab.
